PozitivaHub

Open-source application for CSA (Community Supported Agriculture) - it supports everyday offering-ordering process of one or more CSA groups. Supports several delivery locations, offers automated calculation of ordered quantities/ammounts, data export, communication between group members - all that one CSA group needs to function on daily bases.

Type of work:

UX Design UI Design Frontend Development Backend Development

I was front-end part of the team of two - I covered product concept, visual design, UX/UI design, coding in HTML/CSS (Bootstrap)/jQuery, parts of back-end coding in Ruby on Rails, QA, product launch, implementation and support.

Technologies:
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Bootstrap
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
  • RubyonRails
